metadata.title: CVE-2023-6237 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Excessive time spent checking invalid RSA public keys

criterions.comment: openssl1.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
